segments.text: Hi David , this is Marge . Can you meet me after work for a few minutes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure ! How about the coffee shop right across the street from my office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does five thirty work for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be fine . What I have to show you will only take a few minutes of your time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it the plans for my new house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I just need to double check a few details with you .
segments.speaker: S2
